      • validateUniqueID

        public java.lang.Boolean validateUniqueID​(java.lang.String id)
        Validates if the given ID is unique or not. The element it will be attached to must NOT already be in the doc!
        Parameters:
        id - ID to validate.
        Returns:
        Validity
